entry.title: Why I still develop synchronous web in the asyncIO era
entry.content:
Description

Since python 3.4 the introduction of the asyncIO module produced a new way of building web applications and tons of new frameworks. With asyncIO we take advantage of large throughput over the network, but is it really everything about web development?

entry.title: Adding Cloud to Python Backend
entry.content:
Description

I would like to share the limitations I experienced while developing Python web services and how I overcame them using AWS infrastructure. Based on my experiences with significant server overhead, I will present two case studies and share specific solutions.
